meanings.sent1: She inbreathed the fresh air deeply.
meanings.sent2: He inbreathed the scent of the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The puppy inbreathed the delicious smell of the treat.
meanings.sent4: As she inbreathed the aroma, memories flooded back.
meanings.sent5: Inbreathing the crisp morning air invigorated her.

meanings.definition: To infuse or inspire with a feeling or quality.
meanings.sent1: The music inbreathed a sense of calm within her.
meanings.sent2: His words inbreathed confidence in the team.
meanings.sent3: The painting inbreathed a sense of wonder in the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The poem inbreathed hope into the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The story inbreathed courage in the young readers.
